content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production at (-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0) with drop position (-17.5, -51.5)
- Wooden chest at (-17.5, -51.5) containing 11 iron ore
- Drill contains 11 coal
- System status: drill working

### Copper Plate Production at (-20.5, -71.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at (-20.5, -71.5) containing 2 copper ore
- Original drill has been removed and needs replacement

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-14.5, 15.5) facing UP
- Boiler at (-14.5, 19.0) (currently out of fuel)
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Multiple pipe groups connecting components:
  - Empty pipe group at (-14.5, 12.5)
  - Water-filled pipe group at (-16.5, 19.5)
  - Empty pipe group at (-9.5, 20.5)
  - Empty pipe group at (5.5, 25.5)
- Electric pole network connecting broader system
System status:
- Steam engine not receiving electricity
- Boiler out of fuel but contains water (200 units at 15°)
- Offshore pump working

### Research Facility
- Lab at (10.5, 0.5) containing 15 automation science packs
- Currently researching logistics technology
- No power due to steam engine issues

ERROR TIPS

### Recipe and Crafting Issues
- Recipes need to be enabled before crafting even if technology is researched
- Common failing recipes: burner mining drill, iron gear wheel, stone furnace
- Verify required ingredients are available before crafting

### Entity Placement Issues
- Cannot place burner mining drills without having them in inventory
- Verify inventory has required entity before attempting placement
- Check position is clear before placing new entities

### Resource Extraction Issues
- Cannot extract from drill's burner inventory directly
- Moving or replacing drills to access their fuel is not working
- Ensure proper positioning when attempting to extract resources

### Resource Management
- Monitor coal levels in all fuel-consuming entities
- Current critical issue: Boiler has no fuel
- Keep track of drill fuel levels (copper drill: 12 coal, iron drill: 11 coal)

### Power System Issues
- Steam engine not receiving electricity due to no fuel in boiler
- Monitor fluid connections between power system components
- Address "no input liquid" warnings in steam engine

### API Usage Issues
- PipeGroup class reference errors in code
- Handle nil values appropriately in recipe and crafting operations
- Verify entity existence before attempting operations

### Research Issues
- Cannot start already researched technologies (e.g., automation)
- Monitor research progress for currently researching technology
